Title: The Riddle of the Sphinx
Writer: Jonathan Nolan (created for television by), Lisa Joy (created for television by), Gina Atwater, Jonathan Nolan, Gina Atwater (staff writer), Michael Crichton (based on the film written by)
Actors: Evan Rachel Wood, Thandie Newton, Jeffrey Wright, James Marsden
Plot: An enigmatic figure becomes the center of Delos' secret project; The Man in Black and Lawrence follow the path to Las Mudas, but run into trouble.
